entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High zero. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Rain showers or drizzle beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight.
